message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. How about $110?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $90 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95
